kurs.title: Kurs BRI
kurs.textTooltipBuy: You will sell foreign currency to BRI
kurs.textTooltipSell: You will buy foreign currency from BRI
kurs.textTooltipERate: BRI e-Rate is a special exchange rate that can be enjoyed by BRI e-Banking users when making transfer transactions.
kurs.textTooltipKursTTCounter: BRI TT Counter is a foreign exchange rate service that is carried out directly at the bank counter.
